txt.en: Thad√∫r's voice echoes through the chamber, 'Come and show me what you're truly made of.'
'Find the next two, and do it quickly.'
'Impressive, now for three. Don't let up yet!'
'Welcome, friends.'
'And now the final challenge, clear the four and be prepared to face me!'
'You impress me. Find me in my watery throne and I shall end you myself.'
'Too slow weaklings! If you can't destroy the lights, you shall never stand against me!'
'Take care of these fools. This is not their domain!'
'You have entered your new tomb.'
'Welcome. You have come quite far to end such a meaningless existence.'
'Many kings have been buried here. Like them, you will serve us in death.'
'No more talk! Die!'
'I grow bored of this. My hounds will deal with you.'
'Curses! This is a waste of my time!'
'Do you mock me with this refusal to die? Allow me to collect myself while you meet my friends.'
'Sambrog, send forth your minions!'
'I do not have time to deal with this. You are making me angry!'
'I presume you have a reason for disturbing me for this long? This must end now!'
'This is becoming quite frustrating. I must rest, and then I will deal with you once and for all!'
'This place will soon be your tomb!'
'Ahhh...fresh vessels for our host!'
'Let there be darkness!'
'The time for light has ended, fools!'
'Now it is my turn!'
Hi!
'Bring me the shadows!'
